column2: We have impressive quantities of easily-accessible resources in this province.
We have abundant quantities of resources in this province.
We have higher-than-average reserves of resources in this province.
We are seeing depletion of readily-available resources in this province.
We have ran out of most economically-exploitable areas, and have to dig further and deeper to continue acquiring resources in this province.
We are scraping the last remnants of resources from this province.
It takes some time for the province to readjust to the new economic situation.
